title: "'Alexa, let's read': Amazon's AI assistant can read books with your children, help them learn to read"
excerpt: "Alexa wants to help your child learn how to read. With Amazon's new Reading Sidekick, kids can say \"Alexa, let's read,\" to an Amazon Kids-enabled Echo device or the Amazon Kids+ app on a tablet and the artificial intelligence-powered assistant will take turns reading with them."
